Buy for $21 (Reg. $30)

What we love

There are a million iPhone cases out there, many of them look almost exactly the same …but not this one. There’s also a 3-day Velotric Xmas flash sale to consider hopping on, as it only lasts the weekend. Plus, we also dropped our latest hands-on review of the new Segway E3 Pro Electric Scooter, as well as our favorite EV gift picks this year, and so much more waiting for you below – including every major power station brand launching their holiday savings events. Buy for $9 (Reg. $12)

With this LEGO set, you’ll be assembling a fun little playground for three Goomba figures that stands 3 inches high and 7 inches wide. There are some fun interactive features in the set itself, like pressing a lever to pop a Goomba out of the tree or the seesaw.
